author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-UTI Appoints Scott Yessner As Interim CFO
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Universal Technical Institute Inc :
* UTI APPOINTS SCOTT YESSNER AS INTERIM CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER
* YESSNER SUCCEEDS BRYCE PETERSON, WHO HAS LEFT COMPANY BY MUTUAL AGREEMENT TO PURSUE OTHER INTERESTS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
